definition: ghost/demon/terrible/damnable/clever/sly/crafty/(suffix for sb with a certain vice or addiction etc)/one of the 28 constellations

sentences.english: When the inebriated elk was freed, it lay for a while on the ground, seemingly unconscious.
sentences.chinese: 當“醉鬼”獲救後，它在地上躺了一會，昏迷不醒。

sentences.english: The druken man fell to the floor in a stupor.
sentences.chinese: 這個醉鬼昏迷不醒，倒在地上。
雖然醉鬼酣睡又打呼嚕。

sentences.english: Number three is the story of a local drunk in Thailand.
sentences.chinese: 排名第三的是泰國當地一名醉鬼的故事。

sentences.english: Today, a drunk crashed a truck into my porch.
sentences.chinese: 今天，一個醉鬼把卡車撞進了我家的門廊。

sentences.english: There were lots of drunk men outside telling me to come over so they could give me the night of my life.
sentences.chinese: 門口有一大堆醉鬼叫我過去讓我陪他們爽爽。

sentences.english: Two drunkards meander around Dublin like Odysseus in the Aegean.
sentences.chinese: 兩個都柏林周邊的醉鬼就像愛情海上的奧德修斯。

sentences.english: Today, I was working at IHOP serving a table full of drunk idiots.
sentences.chinese: 今天我在星巴克伺候一桌醉鬼。

definition: variant of 醉醺醺[zui4 xun1 xun1]
lit. as drunk as mud/completely drunk
to get drunk and act crazy/roaring drunk
dead drunk/as drunk as a lord
